sentence: All the data, which was collected by the Democratic firm Beacon Research and the Republican pollster Shaw & Company, is below: GA-Sen: Herschel Walker: 66, Gary Black: 8 GA-Gov: Brian Kemp (inc.): 50, David Perdue: 39 OH-Sen: Mike Gibbons: 22, Josh Mandel: 20, J.D.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 3/9
